ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_PENDING: Your account is pending verification. We've sent a new verification code to your email.
ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email address already exists. Please try logging in or use a different email.
ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS: Your account has been successfully verified! You can now access all features.
ACCOUNT_REGISTERED_SUCCESSFULLY: Welcome to Good-Busy! Your account has been created successfully.
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified and is working to resolve it.
USER_NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find an account with that email address. Please check your spelling or create a new account.
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE: This account has been deactivated. Please contact our support team for assistance.
ACCOUNT_PENDING: Your account is awaiting verification. Please check your email for the verification code we sent you.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
LOGIN_SUCCESS: Welcome back! You've successfully logged in to your account.
INVALID_OTP: The verification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
OTP_EXPIRED: Your verification code has expired. We've sent you a new code.
OTP_SENT: A verification code has been sent to your email address.
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
FAIL_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your session has expired for security reasons. Please log in again to continue.
TOKEN_REQUIRED: Please log in to access this feature.
PROFILE_IMAGE_UPLOAD_FAILED: We couldn't upload your profile picture, but your account was created successfully. You can add a profile picture later in your settings.
INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Please upload only JPG, JPEG, or PNG image formats for your profile picture.
FILE_TOO_LARGE: Your image exceeds the 5MB size limit. Please compress it or choose a smaller image.
FILE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: Your file has been uploaded successfully!
VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT: Your account has been created. Please check your email for the verification code to complete registration.
ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED: Your account requires verification. We've sent a new verification code to your email.
OTP_RESENT_SUCCESS: A new verification code has been sent to your email address.
OTP_REQUEST_TOO_SOON: Please wait a moment before requesting another verification code.
OTP_MAX_REQUESTS_EXCEEDED: You've requested too many verification codes today. Please try again tomorrow or contact our support team.
NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found.
BAD_REQUEST: Your request could not be processed. Please check the data you provided.
UNAUTHORIZED: You need to log in to access this feature.
FORBIDDEN: You don't have permission to access this resource.
CONFLICT: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You've made too many requests. Please try again later.
